actions.text: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 227 (Roll no. 322).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Meehan.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 227 (Roll no. 322).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for Amtrak capital grants used for projects off the Northeast Corridor until the level of capital spending by Amtrak for capital projects on the Northeast Corridor during fiscal year 2016 equals the amount of Amtrak's profits from Northeast Corridor operations during FY 2015.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for Amtrak capital grants used for projects off the Northeast Corridor until the level of capital spending by Amtrak for capital projects on the Northeast Corridor during fiscal year 2016 equals the amount of Amtrak's profits from Northeast Corridor operations during FY 2015.
